timeline.bodyText: Maybe we should remove the version number, what do you think?
timeline.author: OndroMih
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,82 +1,42 @@
 ![#badassfish](payara-logo-blue.png)
 
-# Payara Server 5
+# Payara Server 5 Community Edition

replies.bodyText:
I'm happy to leave it.
On the other hand is there a reason we've got both Payara Server 5 Community Edition and Payara Platform 5 Community Edition headings?
replies.author: Pandrex247

replies.bodyText: The reason is that I didn't find a better solution. The original title was Payara Server but the second half of the page was about Platform (features shared by Server and Micro). So I added a new title for the Platform part. If it's OK to change the original title from Payara Server to Payara Platform then it's enough to have a single Payara Platform title.
replies.author: OndroMih

replies.bodyText: Our docs at https://docs.payara.fish/ now say Payara Platform so it should be OK to change the main title to Payara Platform and remove the second title. Or add a separate title for the Payara Server section and also for the Payara Micro section. Then we would have the main title "Payara Platform" and 2 section titles "Payara Server" and "Payara Micro".
replies.author: OndroMih
